div1.p: Well, the time is passing, thank goodness, and soon I will be on my way again as I surely long to be. I will leave here thanks going evening I reach wall a wall a Sunday evening, laying over in Portland all day Saturday the distance is tremendous; all distances are out here.
Have been having what is known as a very good time; cut my idea of a good time is

being at home, slowly. forging ahead, and with all of you very close. No, no! No city for me! No "civilized life" for me! The single, sweet, unhurried, honest things are all that matter. Branson is the place to live. It would make me heart sick to think of moving you all out here. I don't want you here. I don't want you here, & I don't want to be here, in spite of many attractive features Don't think I am homesickness I am not, tho' I long to be at home. I spent Sunday P.m with Howards in Berkeley (across the Bay).

I'll spend Thanksgiving Day over There. We'll have a picnic on the grass! Then I'll leave at 10:10 P.m., for Portland. Am going by rail, tho' it costs more the ship would me out & the foggy weather is dangerous. I don't like the sea, except as an alien spectacle. I'm prairie-bred, certainly.

The other might Sterling took me to a party, given in a studies in honor of him. I'm glad I went. It was a scream. All clever people, of course, & some bully man. The women made me sick. It was a World Babylonian affair, sure enough. There was claret punch & some got properly scourged. I enjoyed it tremendously. We stayed till 3 a.m & then went on to you Sabern's studio until 4 a.m. You sobern

I was afraid he'd find it in me-really afraid. But he found not a trace of it my only weaknesses are in the nose & in the appendix. Some puss in the region of the nose & a very little in the appendix. He wanted to treat me for nothing, but I can't stay long enough. He claims to have proven that genius is caused by a localization of congenital syphilis in the brain Poets, he says, have

a localization of congenital syphilis in the region just back of the forehead on top. He told this to the doctors present before he tested me for it, & he found a strong trace there. He turned to me & said "I can remove that in two weeks, but you'd better it. I wouldn't take a million dollars for mine, tho it is bad for my nerves." Now all this sounds like backburner. But let me tell you, it is astonishing

how unnerving he was to on the cases I saw. he would test an unknown patient by a drop of blood only. Then he'd call the patient in &, in most cases, even a layman could see. I'll tell you when I come home. One of Abram's disciples is at Eureka Springs. You must go there, Mama, & of your rheumatism: It's caused by focal infection- somewhere, probably in your & your appendix. Abram will write a letter to the war in Eureka Springs for me, & it won't cost much. My bowel trouble is from my appendix. When we was examining my blood, he said "How long ago did you have that trouble with your appendix." I said that in 1896 I had

walked six blocks doubled up with a in my side. He said, "of course", & beamed like a kid. He's a simple soul, & is certainly a genius He is not a father I saw too much to behave he is. I am receiving no mail these days. Of any returns to Branson do not be alarmed, as I ordered it so at Palo Alto after nov 21, today. I was uncertain of my movements.
have been after me, but I'm not going down there. I don't want to go. Kiss my precious wubs all around. How I love them all and then are kisses for all of you, of you cook-and so much .

This trip, in a way, was a mistake; or, at least, it has seemed so. But then, one never . I'll be home just as soon as I can get there, you bet! I want to get to work, & I want to get plain good meals, & I want to

see the fog come up off Taney como; and I want to jump all over we, and I want to be kissed roughly by Mrs. Bessie. I like her better than my lady I've seen on the Coast so far. She's prettier & has better too.
I'm sending only two prints. Divide them. hadn't very good lunch. So many were damned ugly, & I couldn't find a single cherry blossom picture. I may try again before I leave here.
am hanging on to my money desperately. but a certian small size happens just the same Howard is paying for my room & board here. I signed the meal checks, & they are turned in
so much love to all of you. Be happy there. It's a good place to be. O we are fortunate!
